WorkflowInfo.Name: Delete largest 5 files upon request
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of the largest 5 files in a folder, and requests approval for deletion. The approver can select which files to delete.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FolderList;Assembly=FolderList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:SortTable;Assembly=SortTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:Split;Assembly=Split, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns12="clr-namespace:DeleteFile;Assembly=DeleteFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="LocalHost" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="1" TimeSelection="00:00:00" Path="c:\temp" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="1" Condition="0" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="False" MapDrive="True" /><ns1:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="resultSetFilter1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%folderList1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Type = 'File'" /><ns2:SortTable IsValid="True" x:Name="sortTable1" NameType="0" DisplayName="Sort Table" ResultSetName="%resultSetFilter1%" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Sorts the specified table by the specified columns." SortStatement="Size DESC" TypeName="SortTable" /><ns3:GetRows RowNumber="1,2,3,4,5" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="" ResultSet="%sortTable1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="sortTable1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /><ns4:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%getRows1%%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /><ns5:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="300" Subject="5 biggest files" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:05:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P><FONT face=Arial>Reply the file numbers that you would like to delete, 
separated by a comma. For example: 
1,3<BR><BR>%convertToHTMLTable1%</FONT></P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="Response" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Response)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns7:Split IsValid="True" x:Name="split1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SelectedKey="Enter" TheValue="%sendEmail1%" DisplayName="Split" SelectionType="1" Description="Returns a zero-based, one-dimensional array containing a specified number of substrings." TheValue2="," TypeName="Split" /><ns8:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%split1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="split1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"><ns10:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns11:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="line" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%split1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="split1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns11:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FilePath" ColumnNumber="4" ResultSet="%getRows1%" RowNumber="%line%" ResultSetName="getRows1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns12:DeleteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete File" Path="%FilePath%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected file." HostId="1" TypeName="DeleteFile" UserName="" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="No Response" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,No Response)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns9:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
